intents.tag: who is current mayor of kathmandu?
responses: The current mayor is Balendra Shah, who was elected in the 2022 election and took office on 30 May 2022. The position has been held by fifteen people in a permanent capacity since its creation.

Basu Higher Secondary School is a leading public school in Bhaktapur. It was established with primary level classes in 2019 BS. The first batch of students appeared SLC in 2044 BS with merely six students. In 2067 SLC, a contingent of 137 students appeared in SLC examinations from this school.
Amvika Nyaichyai is principle of basu college.if you need more information about basu college you can vist www.basu.edu.np
